CustomField:
LimitsSoslSearches__c Active None false IF( (LimitsSoslSearchesUsed__c / LimitsSoslSearchesMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsSoslSearchesUsed__c / LimitsSoslSearchesMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsSoslSearchesUsed__c / LimitsSoslSearchesMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsSoslSearchesUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsSoslSearchesMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsSoslSearchesUsed__c / LimitsSoslSearchesMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)' BlankAsZero SOSL Searchesx false Confidential false Text false
